headline: Is Apple Still Attractive After AI Push and Strong Multi Year Share Price Gains
summary: Wondering if Apple is still a smart buy at today’s price, or if the real upside has already been taken off the table? You are not alone in asking whether the current tag matches the company’s true value. With the stock at about $278 and up 0.1% over the last week, 2.2% over the last month, 14.1% year to date and 11.4% over the past year, long term holders who have seen gains of 113.4% over 3 years and 122.9% over 5 years might be asking if the next chapter looks as strong as the last...
